name: Somebody turn off the F***ing radio
name_original: Somebody turn off the F***ing radio
description:
A small game I made in a few afternoons just for the sake of it :v.

Use WASD to move around, left-click to interact with objects and/or grab them, and right-click while holding something to throw it.

You can change the song playing by interacting with the small button on the radio.

Unfortunately, some audio mixing that I implemented doesn't work in WebGL, so you'll need to wait for the VR release :v
